BusinessPartner.Heading.contact: Please add your company contact persons here.
BusinessPartner.Heading.visibility: Please set preferences for your public profile.
BusinessPartner.Confirmation.cancel: Do you really want to cancel?
BusinessPartner.Messages.pageHelpText: On this page you provide the data for the registration of your company. If you do not have a VAT Identification Number, please fill in one of the fields marked with **.
BusinessPartner.Messages.failedCreatingE: Data saving failed: a company with the same Company Name already exists
BusinessPartner.Messages.failedCreatingU: Business Partner creation failed: you are already associated to a business partner.
BusinessPartner.Messages.identifierRequi: ** Please provide your VAT Registration Number. If you do not have one, then provide your Global Location Number, D-U-N-S number or OVT number.
BusinessPartner.Messages.required: ** Please provide your VAT Registration Number. If you do not have one, then provide your Global Location Number, D-U-N-S number, OVT number or IBAN.
BusinessPartner.Messages.noVatId: My Company does not have a VAT Identification Number.
BusinessPartner.Messages.clickCheckBox: Please provide your VAT Identification Number.
BusinessPartner.Messages.accessInformati: Here you can request access to company {name}. You should request access only if you are an employee of this company.
Please provide a valid business justification for your access.
Your request will be forwarded to the administrator managing the company's profile.
Once the administrator approves your access request, you will receive an email notification to your registered email address.
BusinessPartner.Messages.information1: Please provide information that helps us to uniquely identify your company and allows us to add it to our trading partner directory.
BusinessPartner.Messages.information2: After providing this information you are ready to login.
BusinessPartner.Messages.companyRegister: Companies are usually registered officially into a commercial register or trading register. They differ by country, for example:
For Germany, it refers to the Commercial Register Number. E.g. Dortmund HRB 1234
For Finland, it refers to the Business ID. E.g. 1629284-5
For Sweden, it refers to the Organization Number. E.g. 556691-8065
For the US, it refers to the Employer Identification Number. E.g. 10-5434567
For Switzerland, it refers to the Enterprise Identification Number. E.g. CHE-105.806.117
For Austria, it refers to the Commercial Register Number. E.g. 973861g or FN 973152s
For Norway, it refers to the Organization Number. E.g. 973861913 or 973 861 913
For Poland, it refers to the Polish register of economic units number. E.g. 192598184
For France, it refers to the Company Identification Number. E.g. 306895939 or 306 895 939
Commercial register number of the company you registering.
BusinessPartner.Messages.cityOfRegistrat: The city where the company you are registering has its headquarters.
BusinessPartner.Messages.countryOfRegist: The country in which the company you are registering has its headquarters.
BusinessPartner.Error.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
BusinessPartner.AccessRequest.head: You have requested access to the company {name}.
BusinessPartner.AccessRequest.text: Please reach out to our support at +49 231 99774525 or customerservice.de@opuscapita.com for further information.
